# ggtimeseries

ggTimeSeries is a collection of specialized plots for Time Series data above and beyond those normally deployed.  It includes waterfall charts, steamgraphs, and some calendar visualizations that are all quite neat.  

[Here is a link](https://github.com/AtherEnergy/ggTimeSeries)

I found `stat_waterfall()` to have particular uses.
